config_cluster module¶

Defines the control configuration parameters. - pretrained: True if model used for MPC has been trained on previous data, False if it is learned in real-time. - train_freq: model is trained every train_freq layers. - n_parts: number of parts built using this control strategy. - ctrl_cfg: Configuration parameters for the control algorithm.

  • per: How often the action sequence will be optimized, i.e, for per=1 it is reoptimized at every call to MPC.act().

  • ac_ub: Upper bounds of the build parameter in the form [speed (m/s), power (W)].

  • ac_lb: Lower bounds of the build parameter in the form [speed (m/s), power (W)].

  • prop_cfg: Configuration parameters for modelling and uncertainty propagation.

    • model_pretrained: True if model used for MPC has been trained on previous data, False otherwise.

    • model_init_cfg: Configuration parameters for model initialisation.

      • ensemble_size: Number of models within the ensemble.

      • load_model: True for a pretrained model to be loaded upon initalisation.

      • model_dir: Directory in which the model files (.mat, .nns) are located.

      • model_name: Name of the model files (model_dir/model_name.mat or model_dir/model_name.nns)

    • model_train_cfg: Configuration parameters for model training optimisation

      • batch_size: Batch size.

      • epochs: Number of training epochs.

      • hide_progress: If ‘True’, addional information regarding model training is printed.

    • npart: Number of particles used for uncertainty propagation.

  • opt_cfg: Configuation parameters for optimisation.

    • mode: Uncertainty propagation method.

    • plan_hor: Planning horizon for the model predictive control algorithm.

    • cfg

      • popsize: Number of cost evaluations per iteration.

      • max_iters: Maximum number of optimisation iterations.

      • num_elites: Number of elites.

    • prop_cfg

      • mode: Uncertainty propagation method, ie “TSinf”

config_cluster.returnClusterPretrainedCfg()¶

A pretrained agent makes use solely of a model trained using previously collected data.

Returns

Configuration parameters for control with a method trained on previous data.

Return type

dotmap

config_cluster.returnClusterUnfamiliarCfg()¶

An unfamiliar agent pretrained agent makes use solely of a model trained using data collected in real-time.

Returns

Configuration parameters for control with a method trained in real-time.

Return type

dotmap
